Description.Text:
Position Hotel Parco Torre Chia looks like a typical hillside hamlet near the Natural Park overlooking a breathtaking view of the Chia Tower and a splendid sea.
Restaurant Tanka S'Isca Restaurant is the main hotel restaurant and enjoys a unique panoramic location. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served buffet style. Soirées with traditional menu from Sardegna and entertainment are organized weekly. A children's restaurant inside Tanka S'Isca is available. There food, decor and buffet are designed for the young customers.
More Informations The hotel also has a spa with sauna, meeting rooms up to 300 people, a swimming pool, room service and laundry service. In the common areas of the hotel free Wi-Fi connection is available.
Check in time from 14.00
